Class AuthController

java.lang.Object
bto.Controllers.AuthController
public class AuthController extends Object
The AuthController class manages user authentication and user account management for the BTO housing system. It handles user login, credential validation, user creation, and provides methods to retrieve users by various criteria.

This controller stores all users in a map indexed by their NRIC for efficient retrieval and enforces validation rules for user information such as NRIC format, password strength, and name requirements.

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthController

      public AuthController()
      Default constructor for AuthController. Initializes an empty map to store users.

  • Method Details

    • validateNRIC

      public boolean validateNRIC(String nric)
      Validates an NRIC (National Registration Identity Card) number. Valid NRIC format is S or T followed by 7 digits and ending with a capital letter.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to validate
      Returns:
      true if the NRIC is valid, false otherwise

    • validatePassword

      public boolean validatePassword(String password)
      Validates a password against the system's password requirements. A valid password must be at least 8 characters long.
      Parameters:
      password - The password to validate
      Returns:
      true if the password meets requirements, false otherwise

    • validateName

      public boolean validateName(String name)
      Validates a user's name. A valid name must be non-empty and contain only letters, spaces, and hyphens.
      Parameters:
      name - The name to validate
      Returns:
      true if the name is valid, false otherwise

    • loginUser

      public User loginUser(String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on NRIC and password. First validates the NRIC format, then checks if the user exists and if the password matches.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user attempting to log in
      password - The password for authentication
      Returns:
      The User object if authentication is successful, null otherwise

    • updateNewPassword

      public boolean updateNewPassword(User user, String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Updates a user's password after validating the new password meets requirements.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose password is being updated
      oldPassword - The current password for verification
      newPassword - The new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully updated, false otherwise

    • getAllApplicants

      public List<Applicant> getAllApplicants()
      Retrieves all users of type Applicant, excluding HDBOfficers who also have Applicant functionality.
      Returns:
      A list of all Applicant users in the system

    • getAllOfficers

      public List<HDBOfficer> getAllOfficers()
      Retrieves all users of type HDBOfficer.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDBOfficer users in the system

    • getAllManagers

      public List<HDBManager> getAllManagers()
      Retrieves all users of type HDBManager.
      Returns:
      A list of all HDBManager users in the system

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to the system after validating their information. Validates NRIC, password, and name, then ensures the NRIC is not already in use.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to add to the system
      Returns:
      true if the user was added successfully, false if validation failed or NRIC is already in use

    • removeUser

      public boolean removeUser(String nric)
      Removes a user from the system by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the user to remove
      Returns:
      true if the user was removed successfully, false if the user was not found

    • findUserByName

      public User findUserByName(String name)
      Finds a user by their name (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      name - The name to search for
      Returns:
      The first User object with a matching name, or null if no match is found

    • getUsers

      public Map<String,User> getUsers()
      Gets the map of all users indexed by NRIC.
      Returns:
      The map of NRIC to User objects

    • setUsers

      public void setUsers(Map<String,User> users)
      Sets the users map to a new map.
      Parameters:
      users - The new map of NRIC to User objects
